name: Orla de Atalaia
description: One of Aracaju's most famous beaches, with beautiful landscapes, restaurants, and leisure options by the sea.

name: Aracaju Municipal Market
address: Rua Senhor dos Passos, Centro, Aracaju, SE
description: A traditional market where you can find handicrafts, typical foods, and local products from Sergipe.

name: Museu da Gente Sergipana (Museum of Sergipe's People)
address: Praça General Valadão, Centro, Aracaju, SE
description: An interactive museum that celebrates the culture and history of Sergipe in an engaging and educational way.

name: Pirambu Cashew Tree
description: A gigantic cashew tree, considered the largest in the world, forming a true forest under its leaves.

name: Church of São José do Rio Preto
address: Praça São José, Rio Preto, Aracaju, SE
description: A beautiful 18th-century baroque church, with imposing architecture and a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Praia do Saco Beach
description: One of the most tranquil and beautiful beaches in Sergipe, with calm waters, great for relaxing.

name: Jeremoabo National Park
description: An environmental protection area with rich biodiversity and trails for ecotourism.

name: Orla Arches
description: An imposing monument on the waterfront, perfect for photos, symbolizing Aracaju's progress and beauty.
